document.full_text: egypt's public prosecutor said it had referred 48 muslims and christians to criminal court on saturday for their roles in sectarian violence that led to the burning of a church in the cairo district of imbaba on may 7.
document.title: egypt to put 48 on trial for church clash
lines_and_colors: egypt's public prosecutor said it had referred 48 muslims and christians to criminal court on saturday for their roles in sectarian violence that led to the burning of a church in the cairo district of imbaba on may 7.
